definitions.name: list

text.english:
Let \(x :: l\) denote the concatenation of the element \(x\) on the head of the list. The set of lists of any set \(A\) \((L_A)\) is defined as follows:
  • \([] \in L_A\)
  • \(\forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; a :: [] \in L_A \).
text.italiano:
Sia \(x :: l\) la concatenazione dell'elemento \(x\) in testa alla lista \(l\). L'insieme delle liste di un qualsiasi insimee \(A\) \((L_A)\) è definito come segue:
  • \([] \in L_A\)
  • \(\forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; a :: [] \in L_A \).

definitions.coq:
Require Import Arith.
Variable A : Type.
Inductive list : Type := | nil : list | cons : A -> list -> list.
Infix "::" := cons (at level 60, right associativity).
Notation "[ ]" := nil (format "[ ]").
Notation "[ x ]" := (cons x nil).
Notation "[ x ; y ; .. ; z ]" := (cons x (cons y .. (cons z nil) ..)).

definitions.name: app

text.english:
Let \( app : L_A \times L_A \to L_A \) be defined as follows:
  • \( app([], \; l2) \triangleq l2 \)
  • \( app(a :: l1', \; l2) \triangleq a :: app(l1', \; l2) \).
text.italiano:
Sia \( app : L_A \times L_A \to L_A \) definito come segue:
  • \( app([], \; l2) \triangleq l2 \)
  • \( app(a :: l1', \; l2) \triangleq a :: app(l1', \; l2) \).

definitions.coq: Fixpoint app (l1 l2 : list) : list := match l1 with | [] => l2 | a :: l1' => a :: app l1' l2 end.

definitions.name: rev

text.english:
Let \( rev : L_A \to L_A \) be defined as follows:
  • \( rev([]) \triangleq [] \)
  • \( rev(a :: l') \triangleq app (rev(l'), \; [a]) \).
text.italiano:
Sia \( rev : L_A \to L_A \) definito come segue:
  • \( rev([]) \triangleq [] \)
  • \( rev(a :: l') \triangleq app (rev(l'), \; [a]) \).

definitions.coq: Fixpoint rev (l : list) : list := match l with | [] => [] | a :: l' => app (rev l') [a] end.

definitions.name: len

text.english:
Let \( len : L_A \to \mathbb N \) be defined as follows:
  • \( len([]) \triangleq 0 \)
  • \( len(a :: l') \triangleq len(l') + 1 \).
text.italiano:
Sia \( len : L_A \to \mathbb N \) definito come segue:
  • \( len([]) \triangleq 0 \)
  • \( len(a :: l') \triangleq len(l') + 1 \).

definitions.coq: Fixpoint len (l : list) : nat := match l with | [] => 0 | a :: l' => len l' + 1 end.

text.english: Base case of app: \[ \forall l2 \in L_A . \; app([], l2) = l2 \]
text.italiano: Case base app: \[ \forall l2 \in L_A . \; app([], l2) = l2 \]

theorems.coq:
Lemma app_nil : forall l2 : list, app [] l2 = l2.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: app_cons

text.english: Inductive case of app: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l1, l2 \in L_A . \; app(a :: l1,\; l2) = a :: app(l1,\; l2) \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo app: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l1, l2 \in L_A . \; app(a :: l1,\; l2) = a :: app(l1,\; l2) \]

theorems.coq:
Lemma app_cons : forall a : A , forall l1 l2 : list, app (a :: l1) l2 = a :: app l1 l2.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: rev_cons

text.english: Inductive case of rev: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; rev(a :: l) = app(rev(l),\; [a]) \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo rev: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; rev(a :: l) = app(rev(l),\; [a]) \]

theorems.coq:
Lemma rev_cons: forall a : A , forall l : list , rev (a :: l) = app (rev l) [a].
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: len_cons

text.english: Inductive case of len: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; len(a :: l) = len(l) + 1 \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo len: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; len(a :: l) = len(l) + 1 \]

theorems.coq:
Lemma len_cons: forall a : A , forall l : list , len (a :: l) = len l + 1.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: app_empty

text.italiano: app di l1 ed una lista vuota e' l1: \[ \forall l1 \in L_A .\; app(l1,\;[]) = l1\]

theorems.coq:
Theorem app_empty : forall l1 : list, app l1 [] = l1.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: app_assoc

text.english: app is associative: \[ \forall l1, l2, l3 \in L_A .\; app(app(l1,\; l2),\; l3) = app(l1,\; app(l2,\; l3))\]
text.italiano: app e' associativa: \[ \forall l1, l2, l3 \in L_A .\; app(app(l1,\; l2),\; l3) = app(l1,\; app(l2,\; l3))\]

theorems.coq:
Theorem app_assoc: forall l1 l2 l3 : list, app (app l1 l2) l3 = app l1 (app l2 l3).
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: len_app

text.english: len of app equals len + len: \[ \forall l1, l2 \in L_A .\; len(app(l1,\; l2)) = len(l1) + len(l2) \]
text.italiano: len di app equivale a len + len: \[ \forall l1, l2 \in L_A .\; len(app(l1,\; l2)) = len(l1) + len(l2) \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem len_app: forall l1 l2 : list, len (app l1 l2) = len l1 + len l2.
Proof.
Admitted.

text.english: Proof by induction. Enter the induction variable:
text.italiano: Dimostrazione per induzione. Inserisci la variabile d'induzione:

text.english: Introduce a variable:\[ \texttt{"} P \to Q \texttt{"} \text{ becomes }\texttt{"}\text{given $P$ prove $Q$}\texttt{"} \]\[ \texttt{"}\forall (x : A) , P\texttt{"} \text{ becomes } \texttt{"}\text{given $(x : A)$ prove $P$}\texttt{"} \]
text.italiano: Introduce una variabile:\[ \texttt{"} P \to Q \texttt{"} \text{ diventa }\texttt{"}\text{dato $P$ dimostra $Q$}\texttt{"} \]\[ \texttt{"}\forall (x : A) , P\texttt{"} \text{ diventa } \texttt{"}\text{dato $(x : A)$ dimostra $P$}\texttt{"} \]

text.english: Apply a definition. Choose the definition from the menu. Optional: use the input box to specify an occurrence writing:\[ \texttt{at occ} \]where \[\texttt{occ}\]is a number starting from 1
